column1: #Text=Aang says : " Maybe I need a little more instruction .
#Text=You might wan na take a couple steps back .
#Text=That was the worst firebending I 've ever seen !
#Text=" Aang says : " I thought it was ... nice .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why is this happening ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe it 's the altitude .
